text: Darko Zibar (born 4 September 1958) is a Croatian rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Yugoslavia Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Osijek
title: Darko Zibar
